alert.note: Alert for Murray; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 24 at 3:40AM EST until February 24 at 10:28PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Coahulla Creek near Keiths Mill near Dalton affecting Whitfield County. ...Forecast flooding changed to Minor severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Georgia... Conasauga River near Eton affecting Whitfield and Murray Counties. For the Conasauga River Basin...including Eton, Crandall, Dalton, Keiths Mill near Dalton, Chatsworth, Tilton, Sloan Bridge near Dalton...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Conasauga River near Eton. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 10 feet, Minor flooding of woodlands...pasture and fields begins along the river...upstream and downstream from the gage on Georgia Highway 286 or Dawnville Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 AM EST Thursday the stage was 12.7 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.9 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 12 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
